title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore      The Shop at George Washington Birthplace National Monument is operated by Eastern National. Eastern National provides support to the park's interpretation and education program from the proceeds of the shop. In addition, the cancellation stamps for George Washington Birthplace National Monument, Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Trail, Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail, and the Potomac Heritage Trail are located in the shop. To contact the Shop at George Washington Birthplace National Monument, please call (804) 224-1732 ext. 227. to contact the Eastern National Manager Office for the park, please call (804) 224-1732 ext. 252 Eastern National Online bookstore: www.eparks.com *The Shop at George Washington Birthplace National Monument closes 15 minutes prior to park closing*
